participant_1.background:
I'm passionate about spending time with my family, though it can be difficult at times.
My parents are great, but they don't understand my lifestyle.
I feel like I'm not living up to my full potential.
I treasure my collection of vintage clothing.
I work as a barista, and I love creating delicious coffee drinks for my customers.

participant_2.background:
I like to go golfing on sunny days with my friends because it is a fun and relaxing way to get some exercise.
I enjoy drawing comics for my grandchildren to enjoy.
I love the smell of fresh-cut flowers.
I am glad that my wife's cancer is in remission and that she is able to enjoy the outdoors with me.
i enjoy taking late night walks when its completely dark.

content.text: It's nice to meet you too! What do you do for a living?
I'm a barista. I love working with coffee and creating delicious drinks for my customers.
Oh that sounds fun! I love coffee. I usually go golfing on sunny days with my friends. It's a fun and relaxing way to get some exercise.
That sounds like a great way to spend a day! I've never been golfing before, but it sounds like it would be a lot of fun.
It's definitely worth trying! And if you're ever in the mood for a late-night walk, I'm always up for one. I love the smell of fresh-cut flowers, and it's so peaceful out there when it's dark.
That sounds really nice! I'll keep that in mind.
